item.description:
We’ll be bidding a fond farewell to our good friend Stefan Shcherby who is starting a new job in New York. After a delicious meal at Rick’s Café, we’ll take the celebration nearby to Vincent’s Night Club for dancing to Current Chart Hits, Top 40 Dance, and Old School R & B!

Dinner at Rick's: 6:00 p.m.
Dancing at Vincent's: 8:30 p.m.
Host: Elaine Senay
Dinner Cost: whatever you eat and drink
Dancing Cost: Ladies are $5.00 until 10 p.m.; Cover is $10.00

If you’re coming to Rick’s, PLEASE RSVP By 12noon, Thursday, October 22, 2009.

Restaurant: Rick’s Café, 63 Mazzeo Drive, Randolph, MA, 781-961-3339, Rick's Cafe

Club: Vincent’s Night Club, 6 Billings Street, Randolph, MA, Vincent's

Directions
From Points South: Take Route 24 North to Exit 20A (Route 139) toward Randolph; turn slight right onto Route 139 East; go straight through two sets of lights; just after the Shell gas station (on right); turn into Rick’s Café parking lot on the left.

From Points North: Take Route 24 South to Exit 20A (Route 139) toward Randolph; turn slight right onto Route 139 East; go straight through two sets of lights; just after the Shell gas station (on right); turn into Rick’s Café parking lot on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: When you RSVP "Yes", Elaine will send you her cell phone number so you can call her if you have trouble finding her at the restaurant.
item.name: Good-Bye & Good Luck Party for Stefan
